triples.name: Multi-agent pathfinding
triples.relevance: ICBS directly addresses the multi-agent pathfinding problem, computing collision-free paths for multiple agents.

triples.name: Conflict-Based Search
triples.relevance: ICBS is an improved version of the Conflict-Based Search algorithm, extending its foundational approach.

triples.name: Improved Conflict-Based Search
triples.relevance: The paper proposes ICBS, an improved version of CBS with three orthogonal improvements that achieve up to 20x speedup and state-of-the-art results.
